<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Peer Beyond](/Feats.aspx?ID=2282) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=88)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2277)

</column>

---

You have uncanny insight into the way [ghosts](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=51) and [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) manifest, manipulate the mind, and rejuvenate. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects caused by [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and haunts, and you can roll a [Spirit Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) or Haunt Lore check for initiative if you know that an incorporeal undead or a haunt is present.

If you are present when a spirit or haunt is defeated, you instantly gain a flash of insight into how it can be permanently put to rest. Typically, this flash manifests as a vision that presents a quick scene closely linked to the source of the spirit or haunt's creation. Attempt a Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore check, respectively, with a DC appropriate for the spirit or haunt's level. On a success, you gain a hint about how to put the spirit to rest or permanently disable the haunt; on a critical success, you learn the exact method of doing so.
name: Peer Beyond
